Posts.Content: May 7, 2012 01:06AM Beth11 wrote: Hi, I just got diagnosed on Friday May 4, 2012 and don't even remember what I have exactly, I didn't get a pathology report and was so shocked I didn't even ask. I wanted to ask if anyone can tell me about Yale New Have Hospital? Yale is about 45 min away from our home and I really don't know what to expect as far as traveling and pain post surgery, how often do i go back and fourth? I have an MRI this week and am so afraid of cancer in my nodes! I can't believe I'm on this site and just want to cry, I have a six year old and am 44. My other question is the name Elizabeth Brady, are their two people with the same name in Ct. I looked on line and the two women I see look very different. I appreciate the opportunity to ask others like me these questions, I'm feeling lost and will take any info that I can get. Thank you very much.
